About

Founded in 2015, Celeix Corp is a growing niche engineering and technology company focused on servicing the design and development needs of our customers—as well as delivering innovative solutions that revolutionize your operations and empower you to do what you do best, even better. Celeix maintains an organizational culture that attracts best-in-class talent, building technology platforms and applications that transform consumer lives by addressing everyday problems with scalable ideas and lasting impact. We believe that best—as well as next—practices, adopted with disciplined management, strategic thinking, and focused execution, can yield not just high-quality results, but exceptional return on investment.

Our Core Values

Integrity

Honesty and reliability are hallmarks of good character, and we’re unconditionally dedicated to reflecting them in our internal and external interactions.

Trust

All relationships are built on trust, and each and every customer and colleague can count on us to honor our commitments interactions.

Wealth Sharing

The greatest success is shared, and we believe that uniting people through common purpose and reward brings out the best in everyone.

Responsible Corporate Citizen

As individuals and as a company, we seek to be faithful stewards of our roles within our business niche and local communities.

Long Term Partnership

Our goal is to establish and build relationships with customers and colleagues alike that are both steadfast and mutually beneficial.

Engineering Technology Trasformation

Our objective at Celeix is more than applying proven engineering processes and technology, addressing problems, and creating solutions … We’re seeking to transform the way you do business. By working closely with your stakeholders and decision-makers, we identify your needs, conceptualize and create the products to meet them, and equip your organization to operate more efficiently and effectively than ever before.

Engineering
for the Future

Our team understands evolving design and development trends, and knows what’s required to maintain a competitive edge. The future is digital … Period!.

Forward
Technology

We believe that stakeholders in the digital societies of tomorrow will need and seek transformative solutions from consulting and services companies—and we’re here to lead the way.

Starting the
Transformation

World-changing ideas and solutions are brought to life by efficiently applying, integrating, and managing the dimensional triad of engineering prowess, talent enterprise, and technology capability.
